author: tilman
msg: PDFBOX-2576: remove unneeded cast; make fields final

author: gunther
msg: HIVE-10106: Regression: Dynamic partition pruning not working after HIVE-9976 (Sid Seth via Gunther Hagleitner)

author: arkurth
msg: Updated utils.pm::is_request_deleted to only return true if the request state or laststate is deleted. It had been returning true if either was makeproduction.pm.  Changed is_request_deleted to utilize get_request_current_state_name - the query was duplicated.
Added utils.pm::set_production_imagerevision. Moved this code from makeproduction.pm.

Fixed how makeproduction.pm::process sets log.ending. It had been setting it to 'EOR' regardless of the previous state. Changed so ending is set to 'deleted' if the previous state is new or reserved, and 'released' if inuse.

author: degenaro

- use WI as key to timeout maps
